original_text: This letter is from me, Paul. I am an apostle of Jesus Christ. It is not any group of people or any one person that has given that authority to me. It is Jesus Christ himself who has chosen me to serve him. And God our Father, who raised Jesus to become alive again after his death, has also sent me.
korean_text: 사람들에게서 난 것도 아니요 사람으로 말미암은 것도 아니요 오직 예수 그리스도와 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 살리신 하나님 아버지로 말미암아 사도 된 바울은

sentences.original_text: This letter is from me, Paul.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 편지는 나, 바울로부터 온 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: I am an apostle of Jesus Christ.
It is not any group of people
or any one person that has given that authority to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나에게 그 권위를 준 어떤 한 사람도 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: who has chosen me to serve him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 나를 택하여 그를 섬기게 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: who raised Jesus to become alive again after his death,
